QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct cast(pharm as bigint) as CARE_SITE_ID, 38004340 as PLACE_OF_SERVICE_CONCEPT_ID, 'Pharmacy' as PLACE_OF_SERVICE_SOURCE_VALUE, NULL as Location FROM {sc}.rx where pharm != '' and pharm != '0' union select distinct prov_unique, case when prov_type = '2' then 8717 when prov_type = '3' then 38004693 else 0 end as PLACE_OF_SERVICE_CONCEPT_ID, case when prov_type = '2' then 'Hospital' when prov_type = '3' then 'Group Practice' when prov_type = '4' then 'Other Facility' else 'Unknown' end as PLACE_OF_SERVICE_SOURCE_VALUE, prov_state as Location FROM {sc}.provider p where prov_type is null or prov_type in ('', '2', '3', '4', '5')
